title: Default value in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying it
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying it.
OB: Currently, the default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying it.
EB: The default value in the list box of a report parameter should be retained after modifying it.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set a default value in the list box of the parameter.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Save the changes and close the report parameter settings.
5. Reopen the report parameter settings and verify if the modified default value is retained.
